channel.title: Help with MIDI controler
channel.description: Newbie here. I've managed to set everything up and I'm having a great time playing my core board from an external MIDI keyboard through a 5 pin MIDI lead. Although the axioloti is responding to the keys, it's not recognising the cc knobs when I assign cc numbers to the board. Am I doing something stupid? Thanks in advance for any help.

item.title: Help with MIDI controler
item.dc:creator: @Gavin Gavin
item.description:
@Gavin wrote:

Been there done that, wait till you find yourself trying to modify a patch in live mode, and you start wondering what the hell is going on... ! LOL

Read full topic

item.title: Help with MIDI controler
item.dc:creator: @Praxis
item.description:
@Praxis wrote:

Edit: yes, just as I thought, I was being stupid! Just figured out that I needed to unclickmand reclick the live box in the top left corner.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with MIDI controler
item.dc:creator: @Praxis
item.description:
@Praxis wrote:

Newbie here. I've managed to set everything up and I'm having a great time playing my core board from an external MIDI keyboard through a 5 pin MIDI lead. Although the axioloti is responding to the keys, it's not recognising the cc knobs when I assign cc numbers to the board. Am I doing something stupid? Thanks in advance for any help.
